full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN YE SHES MKHA' 'GRO MA'I SENG GDONG MA'I BZLOG BSGYUR BYA TSUL NI BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO SENG GDONG MA'I BZLOG BSGYUR GTZO 'KHOR LNGA YI DBANG PHYUG NYI SHU RTZA BRGYAD RDO RJE 'CHANG GI RGYUD LAS NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN DPAL BZANG POS MTSO BDUN GYI LHA KHANG CHEN MO SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN,
